Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to a minority and women-owned business enterprise participation goal requirement in order to receive exemption of new multiple dwellings from local taxation
Summary: Relates to a minority and women-owned business enterprise participation goal requirement in order to receive exemption of new multiple dwellings from local taxation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to a minority and women-owned business enterprise participation goal requirement in order to receive exemption of new multiple dwellings from local taxation for the purpose of fixing economic disparity
